Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
treasury stock issued for employee compensation and stock option plans net of cash proceeds
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of long term debt transferred in business separation
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from exercise of stock options and excess tax benefits
proceeds from issuance initial public offering
Repayment of Debt: settlement of convertible debt acquired from shockwave
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): noncash or part noncash acquisition net nonmonetary assets acquired liabilities assumed1
noncash or part noncash acquisition value of assets acquired1
noncash or part noncash acquisition value of liabilities assumed1
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
stock issued during period value acquisitions
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: business combination contingent consideration arrangements change in amount of contingent consideration liability1
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
payments to acquire in process research and development assets
payments to acquired in process research and development assets
proceeds from sale of productive assets
proceeds payments from to credit support agreements investing activities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
Other Non-Cash Items: discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax
gain loss on sale of equity investments
in process research and development charge

__unmapped__: gain loss on sales of assets and asset impairment charges
